channel.title: Custom Mod Icons
channel.description: Well, I can't seem to get others to see them, only the person who has it can see it... What can I do? :( (Can't switch clients because this one has A LOT of other work on it already)

item.title: Custom Mod Icons
item.dc:creator: @chippeh chippeh
item.description:
@chippeh wrote:

Quit spamming up my damn thread.
PkGeorge1 helped me that’s all that was needed…

Thanks again, now I have 2 donor icons and a vip icon

Read full topic

item.title: Custom Mod Icons
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

Sloppiness is one of the biggest faults on this forums. It’s because people just don’t give a damn on how it looks. Make it neat, follow the conventions, and stop bitching.

Read full topic

item.title: Custom Mod Icons
item.dc:creator: @pk_george1 pk george1
item.description:
@pk_george1 wrote:

Zyle tbh does it really matter the way it looks, just as long as i helped him and it worked ?

item.title: Custom Mod Icons
item.dc:creator: @KlaidasGuru KlaidasGuru
item.description:
@KlaidasGuru wrote:

[quote=“zyle1992, post:3, topic:335481”][quote author=pk george1 link=topic=431862.msg3170443#msg3170443 date=1270399749]

[code]Hello, the client is not your problem you need to go into the server files, i had this exact problem.

Should say something like this in your player.java

protected void appendPlayerChatText(stream str) {
	str.writeWordBigEndian(((chatTextColor & 0xFF) << 8)
			+ (chatTextEffects & 0xFF));
	if(donator == 1 && playerRights == 0)str.writeByte(7);
	else if(playerRights == 3) str.writeByte(6);
	else if(playerRights == 4) str.writeByte(8);
	else
	str.writeByte(playerRights);
	str.writeByteC(chatTextSize);
	// no more than 256 bytes!!!
	str.writeBytes_reverse(chatText, chatTextSize, 0);
}

[/code]
Thats what your looking for.

The player rights bit just change them around and change the out.writes aswell

They should also corespond with the rights in the client.java.

I hope i helped.

[/quote]

l2bb[/quote]

Dont spam zyle.

Read full topic

item.title: Custom Mod Icons
item.dc:creator: @chippeh chippeh
item.description:

looks good, let’s see if it works

it works yay ^_^…THANKS been looking forever to find something like this

item.title: Custom Mod Icons
item.dc:creator: @pk_george1 pk george1
item.description:
@pk_george1 wrote:

[code]Hello, the client is not your problem you need to go into the server files, i had this exact problem.

Should say something like this in your player.java

protected void appendPlayerChatText(stream str) {
	str.writeWordBigEndian(((chatTextColor & 0xFF) << 8)
			+ (chatTextEffects & 0xFF));
	if(donator == 1 && playerRights == 0)str.writeByte(7);
	else if(playerRights == 3) str.writeByte(6);
	else if(playerRights == 4) str.writeByte(8);
	else
	str.writeByte(playerRights);
	str.writeByteC(chatTextSize);
	// no more than 256 bytes!!!
	str.writeBytes_reverse(chatText, chatTextSize, 0);
}

[/code]
Thats what your looking for.

The player rights bit just change them around and change the out.writes aswell

They should also corespond with the rights in the client.java.

I hope i helped.
